pages.about-us: About PhoneArmor - Stylish Protection for Your Device PhoneArmor HOME ABOUT US Cases Contact Elevate Your Phone's Protection: PhoneArmor Features Discover a new level of phone protection with PhoneArmor. Our range of phone cases offers superior durability, sleek designs, and precise fit to safeguard your device. Whether you're looking for style, impact resistance, or enhanced grip, PhoneArmor has the perfect case for you. Explore More About PhoneArmor At PhoneArmor, we are passionate about providing the ultimate protection for your valuable devices without compromising on style. Our mission is to offer a diverse range of high-quality phone cases that cater to the unique needs and preferences of every individual. With a commitment to innovation and customer satisfaction, we continuously strive to develop cutting-edge designs and utilize premium materials to ensure maximum durability and functionality. Whether you're looking for sleek and slim cases, rugged and heavy-duty protection, or trendy and fashionable designs, PhoneArmor has got you covered. Our team is dedicated to delivering excellence in both product quality and customer service. We value your trust and confidence in us and aim to exceed your expectations at every step of your PhoneArmor experience. Stylish Protection "PhoneArmor cases not only protect my phone but also add a touch of style. The sleek designs and durable materials provide the perfect balance of fashion and function. I wouldn't trust my phone with anything else." - Fashionable Phone User Reliable Protection "PhoneArmor cases have saved my phone from countless drops and scratches. The impact-resistant materials and precise fit ensure my device stays safe without compromising its functionality. I highly recommend PhoneArmor to anyone looking for reliable protection." - Active User PhoneArmor uses cookies to enhance your experience on our serene retreat website. Accept or Decline. pages.disclaimers: PhoneArmor Disclaimers - Important Information about Your Device Protection PhoneArmor HOME ABOUT US Cases Contact Disclaimers **General Disclaimer:** PhoneArmor and its affiliates ("we," "us," or "our") provide the information contained on this website (the "Website") for informational purposes only. While we endeavor to keep the information on the Website accurate and up-to-date, we make no representations or warranties, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability, or availability of the information, products, services, or related graphics contained on the Website for any purpose. You acknowledge that such information and materials may contain inaccuracies or errors and we expressly exclude liability for any errors or inaccuracies to the fullest extent permitted by law. **Disclaimer of Warranties:** TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, WE DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. WE DO NOT WARRANT THAT THE WEBSITE OR THE INFORMATION, PRODUCTS, OR SERVICES CONTAINED ON THE WEBSITE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE, THAT DEFECTS WILL BE CORRECTED, OR THAT THE WEBSITE OR THE SERVER THAT MAKES IT AVAILABLE IS FREE OF VIRUSES OR OTHER HARMFUL COMPONENTS. **Limitation of Liability:** IN NO EVENT SHALL WE BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH YOUR USE OF THE WEBSITE OR THE INFORMATION, PRODUCTS, OR SERVICES CONTAINED ON THE WEBSITE. These links are provided for your convenience only and do not constitute an endorsement by us of those websites or resources. We are not responsible for the content, accuracy, or reliability of any information, products, or services found on these websites or resources. **Changes to the Disclaimers:** We reserve the right to revise these Disclaimers at any time by amending this page. You are expected to check this page from time to time to take notice of any changes we made, as they are binding on you. By continuing to use the Website, you are signifying your agreement to the revised Disclaimers. **Governing Law and Jurisdiction:** These Disclaimers shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Country], without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any dispute arising out of or relating to these Disclaimers shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in [Your Country]. pages.privacy-policy: PhoneArmor Privacy Policy - Your Data Privacy Matters to Us PhoneArmor HOME ABOUT US Cases Contact Privacy Policy PhoneArmor ("we," "us," or "our") is committed to protecting the privacy of our users. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you visit our website (the "Website") and use our services. Information We Collect We collect several different types of information for various purposes to improve our services to you. **Personal Information:** We may collect personal information that can be used to identify you, such as your name, email address, phone number, and mailing address. This information is typically collected when you contact us, subscribe to our newsletter, or create an account. **Non-Personal Information:** We may also collect non-personal information that does not identify you individually, such as your browsing habits, device information, and IP address. This information is collected automatically through cookies and other tracking technologies. Use of Information We use the information we collect for various purposes, including: To provide and improve our services To send you marketing and promotional communications To personalize your experience on the Website To analyze how users use the Website To comply with legal and regulatory obligations Disclosure of Information We may disclose your information to third parties in the following circumstances: To service providers who help us operate the Website and provide our services To law enforcement or other government agencies if required by law In connection with a merger, acquisition, or bankruptcy Your Choices You have several choices regarding your information: You can opt out of receiving marketing and promotional communications from us. You can access and update your personal information. You can request that we delete your personal information. Data Security We take reasonable steps to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no internet transmission is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the security of your information. Children's Privacy Our Website is not directed to children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may revise this Privacy Policy at any time by amending this page. You are expected to check this page from time to time to take notice of any changes we made, as they are binding on you. By continuing to use the Website, you are signifying your agreement to the revised Privacy Policy. PhoneArmor uses cookies to enhance your experience on our serene retreat website. Accept or Decline.
